Base: 2 16-oz. cans red beans, drained and rinsed (*keep 2-3 tbsp liquid)

notes: Pretty spicy and simple. Otherwise not much of note
recipe: In a medium pot over medium heat, heat oil. Slice the sausage and cook in the pot until slightly browned
Add onion and the pepper. Cook until slightly softened
Stir in the beans, saved bean liquid, and seasonings. Simmer for 10 minutes
Serve over rice and garnish with green onions
